amendment.purpose: An amendment to the DeLay amendment to restore $30 million of the original $50 million in funding for the Global Environment Facility. The DeLay amendment would eliminate all funding for the GEF.

action.text: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Porter to the DeLay amendment (A015).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 426).
